text: 2|236|Peṇkaḷiṉ maharaik kuṟippiṭāmal (tirumaṇam ceytu) avarkaḷuṭaṉ nīṅkaḷ vīṭu kūṭāmal talākkuk kūṟiviṭṭālum uṅkaḷ mītu kuṟṟamillai. Āyiṉum avarkaḷukku ētum koṭuttup payaṉaṭaiyac ceyyavum. Paṇakkāraṉ taṉ takutikkēṟpavum, ēḻai taṉ caktikkēṟpavum kaṇṇiyattōṭu (avarkaḷukkuk koṭuttu) payaṉaṭaiyac ceyyavēṇṭiyatu nallōr mītu kaṭamaiyākum
